programme.title: Wise Guys With John Tabacco
programme.desc: John Tabacco and his crew look at the big issues, shining a light on hypocrisy and dangerous policies of the elites.

programme.desc: Michael Savage delivers his insights on politics, culture, faith and more as he seeks to save Western Civilization!

programme.title: David Harris Jr. The Pulse Weekly
programme.desc: David Harris Jr. delivers hard-hitting analysis and opinion of the latest news and events.

programme.title: Stand Up Trump: Making America Fun Again
programme.desc: President Donald Trump mounted a stunning victory and returned to the White House - never losing his sense of humor, even in the face of near tragedy.

programme.title: Newsfront
programme.desc: October 7, 2023, was the worst attack against the Jewish people since the Holocaust - sparking antisemitic attacks around the world and fears of a wider war in the Middle East.

programme.title: The President’s Men: Tales From the Secret Service
programme.desc: Protecting presidents and their families is the job of the brave men and women of the US Secret Service. They'd take a bullet! Their stories give a glimpse into the lives of the leaders of the free world. Based on Ronald Kessler's best-selling book.

programme.title: 4-4-43: The Greatest Story Ever Told – The War in The Pacific
programme.desc: 10 American POWs and two Filipino convicts do the impossible during WWII -- breaking out of an escape-proof Imperial Japanese prison plantation.

programme.title: Marines in Combat
programme.desc: The Marines Landed April 1, 1945. It took 300,000 troops and 82 days to take the island. 110,000 Japanese and 125,000 U.S. troops died in the battle, plus as many as 150,000 civilians.

programme.title: The Greatest Generals
programme.desc: Douglas MacArthur's life in the army - from cradle, his dad was an army general, to grave. Douglas, a five-star general, was a leading figure of the 20th Century and World War II .

programme.title: Nuclear Now
programme.desc: Filmmaker Oliver Stone explores overcoming the challenges of climate change and energy poverty through nuclear energy.

programme.title: Zulu Dawn
programme.desc: Taking the Zulu's defiant stance on tribal customs as a declaration of war, the British commander sends hundreds of British troops to squash the African warriors. Cast: Burt Lancaster, Peter O'Toole, Simon Ward

programme.title: Presidents and UFOs: The Surprising Story
programme.desc: A history of UFO's and Presidents, from George Washington to Donald Trump, with expert testimony, interviews, and reports of personal encounters involving U.S. Presidents and unexplained paranormal phenomena.

programme.desc: Start your day with a thorough overview of the latest news, insightful commentary, and expert analysis.
